quote: We propose a novel objective function that exploits the bilateral cyclic relationship between the left and right disparities.
Our full model using a generic encoder-decoder consistently outperforms other methods in all metrics across both depth caps.
Our proposed decoder (*) improves over our encoder-decoder model across all metrics and is the state-of-the-art.
Our experiments (Table 2 and 3) show that our approach produces depth maps with more details while maintaining global correctness.
We achieve state-of-the-art performance on two KITTI benchmarks and show that our method generalizes to Make3d.
X. Fei, A. Wong, and S. Soatto. Geo-supervised visual depth prediction.
